Author: ks788
Text: How do you have the energy to do that.

Author: leftshoelauren
Text: literally yes. i used to be able to restrict really really low (like, <400 a day) but now i float around the 600-900 range and burn off every single calorie at the gym almost every single day. like suddenly my brain doesn’t acknowledge my bmr/tdee. it’s honestly kind of nice because now i can eat more but at the same time i spend 2-3 hours at the gym everyday and it’s so unsustainable. i wasn’t able to go today and i’m freaking the fuck out even though i’m well below maintenance. my brain thinks every cal i ate today is turning directly into fat because i didn’t burn it off. exercise purging/bulimia snuck up on me and i feel like a clown tbh.
